Name: Overhaul
About the game: Overhaul is a rogue-lite puzzle game that combines fast-paced action and quick logical thinking. As Ikalee , venture deep into the abandoned Power Plant to bring the power back to your village. A place that has now been taken over by hostile and mysterious life forms. THINK FAST, ACT FASTER Solve logic-based puzzles in a fast-paced top down action game. Dodge, pick up enemies, carry objects and outsmart the most vicious of situations. Get ready to face all-new challenges every time! HUNDREDS OF HAND-CRAFTED ROOMS Each time you manage to reach the Core, the Power Plant shifts and generates new traps that you'll have to triumph from in your next ventures. Each room is different, pick a difficult one for better rewards or an easier one if you want a smoother ride. It's up to you to carve your own path through the Power Plant . UNLEASH DORMANT POWERS Grow stronger by spending the energy you've collected in the Energy Well . Unlock new abilities and gather powerful items in your journey. A RICH CAST OF MYSTERIOUS ENTITIES Experiment and learn how the different entities interact with one another. Some will try to take you down but you can use them to your advantage. DISCOVER A HAND-DRAWN 2D WORLD Discover what lies inside the Power Plant alongside a carefully composed score that matches with your progression. From moody melancholic ambiance to blood-pumping melodies!
